sentences.en: For a diagnosis of tularemia you need a fourfold increase in serum antibody levels.
sentences.cn: 要诊断是兔热症,她的血清抗体等级需要有4个部分的增长.

sentences.en: How does ability oneself give birth to second liver antibody have?
sentences.cn: 乙肝抗体怎样才能自身生有?

sentences.en: If the antibody reacted, the blood was tainted and should be discarded.
sentences.cn: 如抗体发生反应, 则说明血液已被感染,便不能使用.

sentences.en: In early purifications of this type, antibody was eluted with dilute acid or base.
sentences.cn: 早期纯化这类抗体是用稀酸或稀碱洗脱.

sentences.en: It marshals the same antibody response to both of them.
sentences.cn: 它对两者作出的抗体反应都是一样的.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the clinical significance of the Ryanodine receptor antibody ( RyR - Ab ) and interferon - α antibody ( IFN - α Ab ) in myasthenia gravis ( MG ) patients.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨检测重症肌无力 ( myastheniagravis,MG ) 患者血清Ryanodine受体抗体 ( Ryanodinereceptor antibody,RyR-Ab ) 和干扰素 - α抗体 ( interferon- αantibody, IFN - αAb ) 的临床意义.

sentences.en: Objective : To test the trichinella spiralis antibody from the infected guinea pigs.
sentences.cn: 目的探索检测旋毛虫病抗体的简便易行方法.

sentences.en: Our end product is an anti - cancer antibody.
sentences.cn: 我们的最终产品是一种抗癌抗体.

sentences.en: Scientists call this claw shape the antibody molecule's idiotype.
sentences.cn: 科学家称这种爪型为抗体微小颗粒的遗传型.

sentences.en: Such women carry antibodies which make their blood more likely to clot during pregnancy.
sentences.cn: 这样的女性携带在孕期使她们的血液更可能凝结的抗体。

sentences.en: The antibody can either neutralize the virus or activate the C system, which lyses virus - infected cells.
sentences.cn: 抗体或能中和病毒,或能活化补体系统以溶解病毒感染细胞.

sentences.en: The first antibody drug for cancer finally was approved for patients in 1997 for non - Hodgkin's lymphoma.
sentences.cn: 1997年最先获准用于治疗 非 霍金森氏淋巴瘤的抗体药物.

sentences.en: These technologies effective addressing monoclonal antibody questions and so on mouse source.
sentences.cn: 这些技术将有效解决单克隆抗体的鼠源性等问题.

sentences.en: They bind to antigen -- antibody complexes.
sentences.cn: 它们粘附在抗原 ― ―抗体复合物上.

sentences.en: Until recently, scientists were unable to make full use of antibody power.
sentences.cn: 直到目前, 科学家们还不能充分利用抗体的力量.
